body_content.explanation: the fact or quality of obeying laws or rules, for example obeying standards that control how a particular type of product must be produced:
examples: There has been widespread conformance with the new 30 mile an hour speed limit.
Text can be automatically checked for conformance to basic grammatical rules.
The museum stated that the acquisition of the statue was in conformance with all applicable laws.
Our software is certified at the highest level of industry conformance.
